actions.text: House Committee on Rules Reported an Original Measure. Report No: 97-608.
Called up by House as Privileged Matter.
Resolution Agreed to in House by Voice Vote.

official_title: A resolution providing for the consideration of the bill (H.R. 6094) to authorize appropriations for the U.S. International Trade Commission, the U.S. Customs Service, and the Office of the U.S. Trade Representative for fiscal year 1983, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Sets forth the rule for the consideration of H.R. 6094 (Customs Service, International Trade Commission, and Trade Representative funding).

titles.title: A resolution providing for the consideration of the bill (H.R. 6094) to authorize appropriations for the U.S. International Trade Commission, the U.S. Customs Service, and the Office of the U.S. Trade Representative for fiscal year 1983, and for other purposes.
